Ref:
When you pass the logical ID of this resource to the intrinsic Ref function, Ref returns the quick connect name. For example:

{ "Ref": "myQuickConnectName" }

For more information about using the Ref function, see Ref.

GetAtt.Description: The type of quick connect. In the Amazon Connect admin website, when you create a quick connect, you are  prompted to assign one of the following types: Agent (USER), External (PHONE_NUMBER), or Queue (QUEUE).
